kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
@fcalvo Interesting. I tried to reproduce this on the Community Portal form on the home page, locally, but was unable to.
I recorded a video of the test.
[![validation test video](/getmedia/d8fc2ddd-451c-458a-b6c1-a40ec4c76213/xperience-by-kentico-v28-01-checkboxes-form-field-validation.mp4)](/getmedia/d8fc2ddd-451c-458a-b6c1-a40ec4c76213/xperience-by-kentico-v28-01-checkboxes-form-field-validation.mp4)
Maybe there is something else in the form configuration or JS on the site that is impacting the submission validation?
